Sentencas: With the increasing development of the aviation industry, research into the use of renewable energy and the achievement of an all-electric propulsion system has increased.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: An all-electric propulsion system can improve Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) flight endurance and increase system reliability.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the use of fuel cells as green, efficient, and reliable devices in electric vehicles is more popular.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: In this regard, the present paper attempts to provide a conceptual study of the performance of a small UAV with a propulsion system comprising a battery and a fuel cell, which in parallel provide an all-electric system.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: For this purpose, the performances of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and proton-exchange membrane fuel cell (PEMFC) are evaluated.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, UAV's constraint and mission analysis based on the determination of weight and power distribution are provided.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: In other words, according to these analyses, the weight percentage of each component of UAV as well as the power consumption in each of the flight phases have been determined.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: The appropriate size of each fuel cell to power the UAV has been calculated.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the electrochemical analysis of the fuel cell powered UAV system has been evaluated under the ISA model.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: The overall results of the research indicate that each cell of PEMFC and SOFC systems under design conditions can produce about 97.5 and 210.3 W of power, respectively.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the necessary electricity and net weight of the UAV were 1.65 kW and 6.73 kg, respectively.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: Approximately 48.5% of the UAV's weight belongs to the propulsion system.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the study of the endurance of the fuel cell-based UAV at different energy densities and gravimetric power showed that the UAV's flight endurance could be approximately 6.7 h.
Titulo: Assessment and comparison of the operation of an unmanned aerial vehicle's propulsion system based on the different fuel cells
